summary: 'Avengers: Endgame': New Empire Covers Features the MCU Sequel's Cast!! Check It Out!!
title: 'Avengers: Endgame': New Empire Covers Features the MCU Sequel's Cast!! Check It Out!!
body:
‘Avengers: Endgame’: New Empire Covers Features the MCU Sequel’s Cast!! Check It Out!! #AnthonyMackie, #Avengers, #Avengers4, #AvengersEndgame, #‎BradleyCooper, #BenedictCumberbatch, #BenedictWong, #BenicioDelToro, #BrieLarson, #CaptainAmerica, #CarrieCoon, #ChadwickBoseman, #ChrisEvans, #ChrisHemsworth, #ChrisPratt, #CobieSmulders, #DanaiGurira, #DaveBautista, #DonCheadle, #ElizabethOlsen, #EvangelineLilly, #GuardiansOftheGalaxy, #GwynethPaltrow, #InfinityWar, #JoshBrolin, #KarenGillan, #KatherineLangford, #LetitiaWright, #MarkRuffalo, #Marvel, #PaulBettany, #PaulRudd, #PeterDinklage, #PomKlementieff, #RobertDowneyJr, #SamuelLJackson, #ScarlettJohansson, #SebastianStan, #TerryNotary, #TomHiddleston, #TomHolland, #TomVaughanLawlor, #VinDiesel, #WilliamHurt, #WinstonDuke, #ZoeSaldana

Empire Magazine has revealed two Avengers: Endgame covers for its May issue featuring the remaining members of the Earth’s Mightiest Heroes – Hulk, Hawkeye, Captain America, Iron Man, Thor, and Black Widow – along with the Mad Titan, Thanos, in his full armor; check them out here:

The grave course of events set in motion by Thanos that wiped out half the universe and fractured the Avengers…

summary: if Avengers endgame doesn't end with loki walking past the leftover Avengers like "I would like an entire floor in your Avengers...
body: if Avengers endgame doesn’t end with loki walking past the leftover Avengers like “I would like an entire floor in your Avengers tower now, thank you very much” only to be immediately put under house arrest in a suburban dwelling complete with a picket fence by thor, im going to demand a refund

summary: so I just saw a thoery that what if Tony's voiceover is the beginning of the new Endgame trailer are actually his vows to Pepper...
question: so I just saw a thoery that what if Tony's voiceover is the beginning of the new Endgame trailer are actually his vows to Pepper at their wedding, and omg imagine if that's true?! also, that Katharine Langford could be Clint's daughter Kate.
answer:
NOW

NOW LOOK HERE

I’m used, by now, to Marvel being sneaky about their trailers. To edit them so that the video doesn’t match the audio, like it’s in the movie, to have scenes in the trailer that aren’t in the movie and other shit. They first did it with Civil War and they haven’t really stopped since.

It would be nice, those words to be Tony’s vows. It would be lovely for us to actually see the wedding, for the wedding to actually happen. I’m not getting my hopes up, though, if I’m being honest. At this point, it sounds way too good to be true.

Now. About Kate. I’ve said it in the tags before, but let me rant a little.

I am going to be so very pissed of if they make Kate Clint’s daughter. So fucking pissed off, I’m gonna Hulk out. Let me explain why.

The Hawkeye comic books are really, the only ones I’ve read. I’ve read all of the new ones: Clint’s series by Faction and Aja, the two shorter series that came after it, and the Kate series that went on till last year? Two years ago? That.

I’ve read them, I know them, Kate should not be Clint’s daughter. That’s kind of the point of it. Kate’s dad is a villain and a part of the reason why she becomes a hero. Clint is another part of the reason why she becomes a hero.

She becomes Hawkeye when Clint is (missing, presumed dead) being Ronin. 

She breaks into the Avengers compound and tries to steal his bow, but Steve gives it to her anyway. She already knows how to shoot, because when she was a child, Clint saved her and she saw him, briefly, and started learning how to handle a bow and arrow.

When Clint comes back, she kind of bullies him into training her. And he does. He takes her under his wing, he trains her, and they come out of it with a weird relationship to define. They’re friends, the type of friends that come over unannounced. They share custody over a dog. They banter like they’re siblings. They don’t really ever flirt. They stitch each other up.

More importantly than that, they save each other. They love each other, and when the other one is in trouble, they help. They’re each other’s rocks, in a way that goes way beyond sidekicks.

I really don’t want Kate Bishop to be Clint Barton’s daughter. That will give him a level of control over her that shouldn’t be there, and it will change her history way too much, it will take away some moments that happened and defined Kate, as a character.

Yeah, that actress you mentioned, Katherine Langford (I only saw her in Love, Simon tbh), she looks like Kate. But lord, I’m hoping she’s not.

They already fucked Clint’s character so much. The fact that he has a wife and children pretty much makes most of his traits in the comics disappear. Make Kate his daughter and they’re gonna screw it up even more.

I understand that MCU Clint is different than comic book Clint. I do, I really do. And I understand that in the MCU, they take the stories from the comics and adapt them.

But gods I really don’t fucking want Kate Barton. Not like this. 

(there’s another discussion to be had about Hawkeye Squared, but we’re definitely not going to be having it in the MCU)

I don’t want Kate Barton like this. I love them both too much for me to accept it.

I’ll tell you one more thing, though. I still want to see Kate Bishop in the MCU. I’m so fucking excited about it. If they manage to do Kate right…. and still have her be a Barton…. I’ll get over my anger.

Hi, Im Sin. Just a weirdo pansexual (questioning) on the internet.
Request stuff (might be done so don't be offended if someone else's thing is done before yours but im to busy with school to care right now)
Ask me for advice... more likely to respond quicker to those anyway...
Might make a twitch account and stream me drawing...

title: AHH OK
body:
SO I WAS THINKING! I know something new for me…

IDK if anyone has thought of this…

so when Antman goes into the quantum realm and shit and ended up in a time vortex or whatever that he doesn’t actually go back in time but in fact forward in time a couple of months without realising until he starts walking around and seeing dates on things like newspapers (if they’re still being updated every week/day) or until he goes to Avengers base and realises after talking to the remaining Avengers and that scene in the endgame trailer was him walking to his house (or leaving his house) to look for Cassie and other people he had a connection with before entering the quantum realm? could be possible but not sure if I worded it good enough…
